patterns: Can I get my meds refilled?
I'd like to renew my prescription.
Need a refill on my medication.
Can you help me refill my script?
I’m out of pills—need a refill.
How do I get my prescription renewed?
I need more of my medicine.
Can you process a medication refill for me?
I'd like to order another month of meds.
Running low on meds—need a refill.
I want to renew my Rx.
Can I request a prescription refill now?
Need to top up my medication.
Can you set up my refill?
Time for a refill on my meds.
I'd like to request a renewal.
Could you renew my medication supply?
I need another refill on my prescription.
Please set up a refill request.
Is it time to refill my meds?
My bottle is almost empty—can I get more?
Refill my medicine, I'm running low.
How do I renew my Rx online?
Help me order my next prescription.
Need to renew my script ASAP.
Can you queue a refill for me?
I want to reorder my medication.
Can the pharmacy send through a refill?
Can you renew my medication order?
Please arrange another batch of meds.
I'd like to submit a refill request.
How can I get my meds renewed?
Could you handle my prescription renewal?
Please order a fresh supply of medicine.
Need refill before I run out.
Would you process a repeat prescription?
I'd like to request refills for my meds.
Help me refill my medication today.
I'd like to renew my pills.
Can you refill my medicine quickly?
Set my prescription to be refilled.
responses: Certainly. Which medication would you like to refill?
Of course. Please provide the name of the prescription you need refilled.
Sure thing—what medication do you want to renew?
Happy to help. Which prescription should we refill today?
Absolutely. Let me know the medication name so I can proceed.
No problem. Can you tell me which medicine you’re requesting?
Sure—let me know which medication you’d like refilled.
Absolutely. Which prescription should I renew?
No problem—please specify the medication name.

patterns: I want to renew my Zoloft.
Can you top up my Januvia?
Need a new box of Lantus.
responses: Thank you. Would you like to pick up the {medication} at our pharmacy or have it mailed?
Got it—{medication}. Do you prefer in-person pickup or mail delivery?
Understood. Should we prepare {medication} for pharmacy pickup or mail it to you?
Refill noted for {medication}. How would you like to receive it—pickup or mail?
Alright. For {medication}, do you want to collect it here or have it shipped?
Thanks—{medication} added to your request. What pickup or delivery method works best?
Thanks—refill request for {medication} noted. Pickup or mail?
Understood. We'll process {medication}. How would you like to receive it?
Got your {medication} refill. Do you prefer pharmacy pickup or delivery?

patterns: I'll pick it up at the pharmacy.
Mail it to my home, please.
Can you deliver it to my address?
Send it to my mailing address.
I'll pick it up after 3 p.m.
I'll pick it up on Friday.
Please leave it at the front desk for pickup.
I can pick it up later today.
Mail it to my PO box.
Let me collect it in clinic.
Have it ready for lobby pickup.
I'd rather pick it up myself.
I prefer to collect in person.
I'll grab it during clinic hours.
Drop it in the mail, thanks.
responses: Great—your refill will be prepared for {method}. You’ll receive a notification when it’s ready.
Understood. We’ll arrange {method} and let you know once processed.
No problem. Your prescription will be set for {method}. Expect confirmation soon.
Certainly. We’ll handle the refill via {method}. Thank you.
All set. {method.capitalize()} option selected. We’ll update you when it’s complete.
Your preference for {method} is noted. We’re processing the refill now.
Perfect—we’ll proceed with {method}. Watch for confirmation.
Confirmed. {method.capitalize()} arranged; we’ll notify you when ready.
Your {method} request is set. Thank you.
Your prescription refill is confirmed. Expect a notification once it’s ready.
Great—your refill request has been submitted. We’ll let you know when you can pick it up or when it ships.
All set! The pharmacy is processing your refill now.
Done. Your refill is in progress; thank you for confirming.
Confirmed. We’ll notify you as soon as your medication is ready.
Refill request finalized. Let us know if you need anything else.
Excellent—your refill is underway.
Great, we’re processing it now.
Refill confirmed; expect an update soon.

patterns: I want to file a complaint.
I have a concern about my care.
I'd like to submit feedback about poor service.
I need to report an issue.

I’m not satisfied with the treatment I received.
I want to talk to someone about a problem.
I have a complaint regarding billing.
I need to report unprofessional behavior.
I'd like to speak with patient relations.
I want to lodge a complaint about the food.
Nurse was rude—I want to report it.
I need to file a grievance.
I want to provide negative feedback.
I need to complain about wait times.
Please help me submit a complaint.
How do I escalate an issue?
I have an issue I'd like to raise.
Need to lodge a complaint about staff attitude.
I experienced poor service—want to report.
I wish to give negative feedback.
Where can I file a grievance?
I’d like to complain about the noise.
I want to report a safety concern.
Need to talk about an incident.
I have a problem with my billing statement.
I’d like to escalate my concern.
Who do I speak to about a complaint?
I want to report a disrespectful comment.
I need to log a complaint about wait time.
The room wasn’t clean—want to complain.
I’d like to submit a service complaint.
How do I voice my dissatisfaction?
I need to express a concern.
Where can I leave formal feedback?
I have a grievance to report.
Want to complain about delayed test results.
I need to talk to a supervisor.
Please help me file a negative report.
I'd like to complain about the food quality.
I need to report a privacy issue.
I have concerns about medication errors.
I'd like to highlight poor bedside manner.
Want to file complaint on cleanliness.
I wish to complain about visitor policy.
I want to raise an issue with security staff.
I'd like to flag a safety hazard.
Help me write a complaint letter.
I want management to know my concern.
responses: I’m sorry to hear that. Could you briefly describe the issue so I can direct it to the right department?
We apologize for any inconvenience. Please share details of your concern, and we’ll help you escalate it.
Certainly. Let me know the nature of your complaint, and I’ll start the report.
I understand. Could you tell me what happened so I can assist you properly?
We take feedback seriously. Please describe the issue, including date and staff involved if possible.
Of course. What aspect of your experience would you like to report?
I’m sorry about your experience. Please provide details so we can assist.
Certainly—we value your feedback. Could you describe what happened?
Understood. Let’s gather information about your concern.
